entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023
